summary: Contoso Wireless offers a one year warranty and a 30 day satisfaction guarantee for their phones, as well as unlimited data and text messaging, access to their nationwide 4G LTE network, 24/7 customer service line, and access to their online store. They also have an online FAQ page, a customer service line, and live chat experts available to answer any questions. They recommend keeping the phone updated with the latest software updates, using a secure password when setting up the device, regularly backing up data, and taking advantage of their insurance plans. They also have tutorials available on their website to help customers learn how to use all the features of their device.
